sentences.english: You could even learn how to scuba dive.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以學如何浮潛。

sentences.english: Palau is noteworthy for its amazing and scuba diving sights.
sentences.chinese: 帛琉以其令人讚歎的浮潛和潛水景點著稱。

sentences.english: Kevin went snorkeling in Kenting to see the beautiful coral.
sentences.chinese: 凱文到墾丁浮潛，看到了美麗的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: NOT suitable for swimming, snorkeling, water related work and fishing.
sentences.chinese: 不適合游泳，浮潛，水和漁業相關的工作。

sentences.english: Snorkeling can be just as rewarding a way of exploring the magical underwater world.
sentences.chinese: 通過浮潛探索神祕水下世界也能讓你獲益匪淺。
在礁石海水浴場裏浮潛。

sentences.english: You and your honey can bask in the sun, go snorkeling and diving.
sentences.chinese: 您和您的蜂蜜，可三五在陽光下，去浮潛，潛水等。

sentences.english: For water sports, scuba-diving and snorkeling courses are available.
sentences.chinese: 其水上運動包括水肺潛水和浮潛課程可供選擇。

definition: Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
to soak in a spa or hot spring
to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
Saigon, capital of former South Vietnam/Sai Kung town in New Territories, Hong Kong
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
